title: 302A.311 OTHER OFFICERS.
text: The board may elect or appoint, in a manner set forth in the articles or bylaws or in a resolution approved by the affirmative vote of a majority of the directors present, any other officers the board deems necessary for the operation and management of the corporation, each of whom shall have the powers, rights, duties, responsibilities, and terms in office provided for in the articles or bylaws or determined by the board. To the extent authorized in the articles, the bylaws, or a resolution approved by the affirmative vote of a majority of the directors present, the chief executive officer may appoint one or more officers, other than the chief financial officer. An election or appointment as described in this section is subject to the provisions of a shareholder control agreement.
